title: AE脚本-快速生成制作箭头动画脚本 Easy Arrows v1.5
author: 大众脸
content: 快速生成制作箭头动画脚本 AEscripts Easy Arrows，通过脚本可以非常简单快速的在AE中制作箭头动画，用mask在固态层上画出箭头路径轨迹，然后用脚本自动生成箭头动画，脚本还可控制箭头的样式，宽度，颜色，动画等属性。Animating arrows in After Effects has never been easier! With Easy Arrows you can attach an arrow to the front and end of a stroke with the click of a button. The arrow(s) will auto-orient along your mask path and change size to match the width of your stroke. There is a default arrow included, but you can also use custom layers of your own! v1.5更新内容：兼容苹果10.15系统

other.script_installation: 将jsxbin脚本文件拷贝到以下目录：…..\Adobe After Effects 版本号\Support Files\Scripts\ScriptUI Panels\
